europeana:record.dc:title: On the generic names Gonydactylus Kuhl & van Hasselt, 1822, Goniodactylus Schlegel, 1826, and Gonyodactylus Wagler, 1830 (Reptilia: Sauria: Gekkonidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Mees G.F.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Amphibia, Reptilia
Gonydactylus
Goniodactylus
Gonyodactylus
europeana:record.dc:description: Instead of straightening it out, Kluge (1985) has added some twists to the tortuous history of the name Gonydactylus Kuhl & van Hasselt. In this paper, an attempt is made to present the case more clearly. Contrary to Kluge's conclusion, the name does not affect current nomenclature.
